name: coolingTemperature_setValue
description: This function sets the cooling temperature of a device through voice commands. The utterance must explicitly include the expression 'cooling temperature'.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the cooling temperature for.

parameters.name: coolingTemperature
parameters.description: The specific value to set the cooling temperature to.

parameters.name: predefinedCoolingTemperatureUnit
parameters.description: The unit of measurement for the cooling temperature (e.g., Celsius, Fahrenheit).
